Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory919.jpg'}
{3: 'Luna finally reaches her goal after destroying the last enemy in her path.'}
{3: 'A crystal hourglass sits within interwoven rotating rings. Fine particles of unknown material slowly trickle down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Meaningless symbols, useless constraints...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna gazes upon the core of the prison that has held her for so long, while the power of Punishing gathers in her palm.'}
{3: 'When the attack is unleashed, the perpetual rings cease to rotate, the eternal hourglass ceases to flow, and the bizarre device creaks with its imminent collapse.'}
{3: 'The impervious space begins to tremble as if responding to a signal.'}
{3: 'BOOM—! BOOM—! BOOM—!'}
{3: "The tremors grow stronger, and the force ripples through Luna's body."}
{3: 'Luna maintains her expression as blood trickles from the corner of her mouth. Her tone grows even more detached.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'I refuse to write with your pen and paper, or to think within your prescribed boundaries.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I have my own solution.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Click—'}
{3: 'Her whispered words carry the weight of a command, and the space itself shatters in response.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Luna slowly releases her breath in the vast darkness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'The chains are finally broken. Now...', 4: '1'}
{3: "As the space fractures, a faint sensation gradually returns to Luna's consciousness."}
{3: "She narrows her eyes slightly as she turns her gaze. Luna's stare pierces the surrounding darkness, transcending distance and time to reach the heavens above."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Babylonia... Selene, why are you there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "No... that's not right. How are you able to get there?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Time seems to flow fast and slow at the same time. When Selene opens her eyes again, she finds herself high above the void on the territory of humans.'}
{3: 'Humans and Constructs hurry past Selene in all directions, yet no one notices her.'}
{3: 'Some even run straight toward her, but pass right through her body without colliding with her.'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Babylonia... If I could destroy this place...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selene focuses intently on her surroundings as data and theoretical solutions cascade through her consciousness like a waterfall, only to be systematically rejected.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'Insufficient power. New plans suspended. Prioritizing original objective.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Clue confirmed—contamination memetics.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Selene closes her eyes as her perception, elevated to another plane by the Ascension-Network, extends like branching tentacles throughout Babylonia and continuously feeds information back to her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'Trillard... The United Declaration... contamination memetic survival duration... over one year...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Power system destroyed. Gestalt will be directly affected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Communication system destroyed. Agent Zero is directly affected.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selene watches as the engineering staff rush to repair various facilities in Babylonia, while Construct teams set up temporary local communication devices at different passage nodes.'}
{3: 'She also sees the activated Omega Weapons. Deeper within the clean zones cleared by the Omega Weapons, she finds more deeply hidden contamination memetics.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: "You're all fighting...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selene opens her eyes again. A cold gleam flickers briefly in her gaze.'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'The "contamination memetic" will vanish if Babylonia kills Agent Zero.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory266.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Selene speeds up. She follows the trail of clues until finally, somewhere in the data, she finds her target.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'However, before she can speak, Agent Zero suddenly turns to attack Selene.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Something indecipherable burrows into her body, corrupting and altering Selene's perception and consciousness."}
{2: 'Selene', 3: '...What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'Who are you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "I don't understand your confusion. You are the Ascension-Network's connection point in Babylonia, so you should know it all.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With the power of the Ascension-Network, Selene calmly purges Agent Zero's influence."}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "The Ascension-Network needs your traits. I'm here to help you break free.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'And let me be devoured by the Ascension-Network as nutrients?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Agent Zero intensifies the flow of corruption.'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "That's not worth it for me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "How could you? Isn't completing the Filtering and ascension the ultimate goal of the Punishing?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Agent Zero falls silent because this line of reasoning aligns with its core logic.'}
{3: "That would have been the case if Agent Zero didn't have the consciousness to contemplate everything in this moment."}
{3: 'Why... is it weighing these options? Why is it even considering these?'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: '...Personality...?! Dominik, what have you done to me?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "Dominik? Is that name the reason you're refusing to cooperate?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "No... it's nothing...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Agent Zero suddenly lifts its tone. An inexplicable pleasure is reinvigorating its weary consciousness.'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "Let's leave the matter of me being devoured for now—how do you plan to help me break free?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "I am connected to the Ascension-Network, but it can't help me escape, or I would have returned to the surface long ago.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'I know, you need a physical vessel to leave Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selene nods, lowers her defenses, and gestures for Agent Zero to merge with her.'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "That's why I'm here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: '...That is a good plan, but I have one condition.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'I will choose where we merge with the Ascension-Network.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "That's not the problem, but I must tell you that humans have reclaimed control over many areas of the surface.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'Such as the Clean Zone?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: '...Why would you choose a place like that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'Would you believe me if I said the Inver-Hetero Tower in the Clean Zone can help the Ascension-Network acquire my traits?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Why are you trying to emphasize doubt as an emotion?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'You really are...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The sound of systems rebooting echoes through the space, as the emergency repairs begin to take effect.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "Tch... They just won't let up. Let's get it on, then.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'A tearing sound echoes as the two entities merge into one.'}
{3: 'The incompatibility causes extreme discomfort for both Agent Zero and Selene, but at least they can still move with difficulty.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'Commence operation.', 4: '1'}
